short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Soccer Penalty Kick is an entertaining football game in which you will take on the role of a player who is given a penalty kick.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time for some penalty kicking. By trying to make shots in this game, you can get better. Determine your shot's power and the proper shooting direction. Keep your breath held, then shoot! Take as many shots as you can.

How to Play:

Use your mouse to click and slide the ball as the shooter to release the shot.
Don't swipe too far or you could miss it!
